trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from instances of a <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represent an object's length.

<xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.LengthConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether conversion is possible from a specified type to a <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represents an object's length.

<xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion to and from the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
Provides contextual information about a component.
Identifies the data type to evaluate for conversion.
`true` if conversion is possible; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether conversion is possible to a specified type from a <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represents an object's length.

<xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, and <xref:System.UInt64>.
Provides contextual information about a component.
Identifies the data type to evaluate for conversion.
`true` if conversion to the destinationType is possible; otherwise, `false`.
Converts instances of other data types into instances of <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represent an object's length.

<xref:System.Windows.LengthConverter> supports conversion of the following types: <xref:System.String>, <xref:System.Decimal>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.UInt16>, <xref:System.UInt32>, <xref:System.UInt64>.
Provides contextual information about a component.
Represents culture-specific information that is maintained during a conversion.
Identifies the object that is being converted to <xref href="System.Double"></xref>.
An instance of <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that is the value of the conversion.
Occurs if the source is `null`.
Occurs if the source is not `null` and is not a valid type for conversion.
Converts other types into instances of <xref href="System.Double"></xref> that represent an object's length.
Describes context information of a component, such as its container and <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref>.
Identifies culture-specific information, including the writing system and the calendar that is used.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that is being converted.
The data type that this instance of <xref href="System.Double"></xref> is being converted to.
A new <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that is the value of the conversion.
Occurs if the value is `null`.
Occurs if the value is not `null` and is not a , or the destinationType is not valid.
